definition: "Kürze" refers to the quality or state of being brief or concise. It is commonly used to describe the brevity or conciseness of something, such as a piece of writing, a speech, or a summary. It emphasizes the ability to convey information or express ideas in a succinct manner.

examples.german: In Kürze werden wir die Ergebnisse bekannt geben.
examples.english: We will announce the results shortly.

examples.german: Bitte fassen Sie sich in Kürze.
Ich komme in Kürze zu Ihnen.
examples.english: I will come to you shortly.

examples.german: Er hat in Kürze viel erreicht.
examples.english: He has achieved a lot in a short time.
